name: Vivek Patel
title: Shopify Developer
summary: Skilled Shopify Developer with a strong background in theme customization, performance optimization, and responsive frontend development. Known for delivering innovative, high-quality e-commerce solutions.

responsibilities: Maintain and optimize Shopify website for performance and UX
Develop and troubleshoot custom themes aligning with brand identity
Built custom sections using schema settings
Worked with metafields, product templates, and jQuery
Optimized stores for speed and mobile UX
Handled client communication and third-party app integrations

projects.name: Missionary to Madame
projects.description: Adult Australian DTC e-commerce site. Customized and migrated Shopify Dawn theme, built tailored templates, and optimized site UX and responsiveness.

projects.name: Habibi NY
projects.description: Contributed to site development and customization for a premium brand. Focused on responsive design and client feature requirements.
